about_the_game:
Farm the world in an immersive top-down management game. It's up to you if you prefer to experience a rich strawberry harvest in the French countryside or if you like farming in the hot sun of South America. Choose your farm’s location anywhere on a real-world map and become a Global Farmer!

Choose your location

Based on real-world data from OpenStreetMap, you can play anywhere in the world. Explore your own neighborhood from the perspective of a budding farmer, or try to become a successful agriculture magnate conquering the world.

Organize your farm space

Build your own farming infrastructure with things like storage facilities, parking for your vehicles, paths to get around your farm, sheds for your animals and many more. Purchase a variety of equipment inspired by real-world agricultural vehicles and implements.

Develop the best crop rotation

Various environmental factors influence the growth and success of your crops: Daily changing temperature, sunshine hours and rainfall make up the requirements of optimal crop growth. Nutrients (NPK) and the soil composition further influence the growth and success of your crops. Investigate different field values and choose the most effective crop rotation. Plant the correct crops in the right areas, manage many different fields in parallel and watch your income increase.

Buy and care for livestock

Construct barns and sheds for 3 types of farm animals. Assign fields as pastures and make sure that your animals stay fed during all seasons and temperatures by moving them between the green grasslands and your warm farm. In return, they will reward you with profitable milk, wool and eggs.

Create and share your own maps

Struggling because you live in an area with little data? Use our level editor and create your own unique field maps based on the real world OSM data. Afterwards you can share those with the community via the Steam Workshop.

Embrace the regional challenges

Ready for a challenge? Try to cultivate various crops across different continents. The weather and pricing will adapt according to the precise coordinates you select, reflecting global real-world data. Soil conditions, including texture and pH levels, will also vary depending on the region chosen.

Fulfill Contracts

Perform contract work to increase your revenue by delivering goods. Handle your resources wisely to fulfil orders on time. Take on increasingly challenging contracts and earn more money.

Features

  • Place your farm anywhere in the world

  • Based on OSM data and incorporation of real-life soil and temperature values

  • Use the map editor to modify the existing OSM data

  • Build and expand your own farm

  • Purchase a fleet of farm equipment like tractors, harvesters and different implements

  • Cultivate numerous different crops

  • Deal with seasonal fluctuations and their different effects on the growth of your crops

  • Accept and fulfil contracts with local businesses

  • Take care of animals & let them produce goods for you

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700, AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: UHD Graphics 630 or similar
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700K, AMD Ryzen 5 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or similar
  • Storage: 45 GB available space

short_description: Farm the world in an immersive top-down management game that lets you choose your farm's location anywhere on the real-world map! Want to experience a rich strawberry harvest in the French countryside? Or challenge the hot sun in South America? The choice is yours!
supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
